DataElement.preferredDefinition: Code that represents the anatomic location for the oral residue impairment of the Modified Barium Swallow Impairment Profile.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Modified Barium Swallow Impairment Profile Oral Impairment During Swallowing Location of Oral Residue Following Swallowing Anatomic Site
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An evidence-based, standardization of the Modified Barium Swallow Study in adults. The protocol assesses 17 critical components of swallowing and provides an objective profile of the physiologic impairment affecting adult swallowing function._An assessment of an individual's oral impairment during swallowing._An observation of the location of oral residue remaining after an individual swallows._Named locations of or within the body.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An evidence-based, standardization of the Modified Barium Swallow Study in adults. The protocol assesses 17 critical components of swallowing and provides an objective profile of the physiologic impairment affecting adult swallowing function.

Concepts.definition: An evidence-based, standardization of the Modified Barium Swallow Study in adults. The protocol assesses 17 critical components of swallowing and provides an objective profile of the physiologic impairment affecting adult swallowing function.

Property.preferredName: Oral Impairment During Swallowing Location of Oral Residue Following Swallowing Anatomic Site
Property.preferredDefinition: An assessment of an individual's oral impairment during swallowing.:An observation of the location of oral residue remaining after an individual swallows.:Named locations of or within the body.

Concepts.definition: An assessment of an individual's oral impairment during swallowing.

Concepts.longName: Location of Oral Residue Following Swallowing
Concepts.definition: An observation of the location of oral residue remaining after an individual swallows.
Named locations of or within the body.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A finding of oral residue remaining on lateral sulci after an individual swallows.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A finding of oral residue remaining on floor of mouth after an individual swallows.

Concepts.definition: A finding of oral residue remaining on floor of mouth after an individual swallows.
